title: Truncate Sentence
description: A sentence is a list of words that are separated by a single space with no leading or trailing spaces. Each word consists of only uppercase and lowercase English letters. You are given a sentence s and an integer k. You want to truncate s such that it contains only the first k words. Return s after truncating it.
input_format: First line: string s. Second line: integer k.

constraints.k: 1 <= k <= number of words in s
